Sentencas: A mathematical model of a single unit solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) based on partial differential equations is presented in this paper.
Titulo: A PDE model for microscopic simulation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The model consists of mass, momentum and charge conservation equations, relating gas concentration to voltage, current density, and other relevant fuel cell parameters.
Titulo: A PDE model for microscopic simulation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The model is applied and validated on a planar disk-shape anode-supported cell.
Titulo: A PDE model for microscopic simulation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Data regarding materials' properties and kinetic parameters are taken from the open literature or derived from experimental results.
Titulo: A PDE model for microscopic simulation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A commercial tool using the finite element method is used to solve the set of equations.
Titulo: A PDE model for microscopic simulation of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The simulated steady state performance of the fuel cell, for different operating conditions and current densities, is further investigated.
Titulo: A PDE model for microscopic simulation of solid oxide fuel cells
